mapper.select: SELECT sr.ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM SHIRO_USERS su ,SHIRO_ROLES sr, SHIRO_R_USER_ROLE srur WHERE su.USERNAME=#{userName} AND su.ID=srur.USER_ID AND srur.ROLE_ID=sr.ID

SELECT sp.PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION FROM SHIRO_USERS su,SHIRO_ROLES sr,SHIRO_R_USER_ROLE srur,SHIRO_PERMISSIONS sp,SHIRO_R_ROLE_PERMISSION srrp WHERE su.USERNAME=#{userName} AND su.ID=srur.USER_ID AND srur.ROLE_ID=sr.ID AND sr.ID=srrp.ROLE_ID AND srrp.PERMISSION_ID = sp.ID

SELECT DISTINCT sres.ID,sres.RESOURCE_NAME,sres.RESOURCE_URL FROM SHIRO_USERS su,SHIRO_ROLES sr,SHIRO_R_USER_ROLE srur,SHIRO_RESOURCES sres,SHIRO_R_ROLE_RESOURCE srrr WHERE sres.RESOURCE_TYPE=1 AND su.USERNAME=#{userName} AND su.ID=srur.USER_ID AND srur.ROLE_ID=sr.ID AND sr.ID=srrr.ROLE_ID AND srrr.RESOURCE_ID=sres.ID
